name: chronokit
description: ChronoKit is a powerful and flexible date/time manipulation library that makes it easy to perform common tasks such as converting between time zones, calculating time difference, and parsing date/time strings. With a simple intuitive API, ChronoKit offers a wide range of features and options fro working with dates and time, making it an essential tool for any developer who needs to work with time-base data.
author: Pasindu Weerakoon
